text: Sebastian and the Sparrow is a 1988 Australian adventure drama movie directed by Scott Hicks and starring Alexander Bainbridge, Heather Kelly-Lewis, Jeremy Angerson, Robert Coleby, Elizabeth Alexander. ==Other websites== *Sebastian and the Sparrow at IMDb *Sebastian and the Sparrow at Oz Movies Category:1988 drama movies Category:1980s family movies Category:1988 adventure movies Category:Australian adventure movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Scott Hicks
title: Sebastian and the Sparrow
